backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a GitHub bookmark app backend with user profiles, GitHub token storage, and bookmark management, all protected by role-based access control via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference for the project's frontend architecture and component responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom property color tokens for both light and dark themes, plus base border and background body styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell with a root div and a module script tag loading the React app entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for home, search, trending, bookmarks, and repo details pages, and conditionally shows a ProfileSetupModal for newly authenticated users.
Expandable panel that displays AI-generated repo insights (summary, why interesting, difficulty badge, similar projects) using the repoInsights utility with a toggle button.
frontend/src/components/AISetupAssistant: Expandable panel that fetches a repo's file tree and key config files to generate a setup script, Docker Compose file, and setup instructions, with an option to commit them to a fork.
frontend/src/components/AuthGuard.tsx: AuthGuard component that conditionally renders children based on authentication state, plus an AuthPromptDialog modal that triggers Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: A toggle button component that bookmarks or unbookmarks a repository by ID, showing an auth prompt dialog if the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkCard.tsx: A card component displaying a bookmarked repository with its stats, tags, and notes, supporting inline editing of tags and notes via mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/CodeBlock.tsx: A styled code display component with copy-to-clipboard and optional file download functionality, showing language and filename labels.
frontend/src/components/CommitToForkButt: A button component that commits a list of files to a forked GitHub repository, showing per-file upload status and a confirmation dialog before proceeding.
frontend/src/components/ContributorsList: Renders a list of up to 10 repository contributors with avatars, usernames, and commit counts, each linking to their GitHub profile.
A colored badge component displaying a difficulty level (Beginner/Intermediate/Advanced) with a tooltip showing the rationale.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: A centered empty-state UI component displaying an icon, title, description, and optional action element.
frontend/src/components/ErrorState.tsx: A centered error display component showing an alert icon, error message, and an optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/ForkButton.tsx: A button that forks a GitHub repository using the user's stored token, handling unauthenticated and missing-token states with appropriate tooltips and dialogs.
frontend/src/components/GithubTokenSetti: A dialog component for managing a GitHub Personal Access Token, supporting saving, displaying masked status, and removing the stored token.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main app layout component with a sticky header containing the RepoRadar logo, navigation links (Search, Trending, Bookmarks), and an authenticated user dropdown menu with logout and GitHub token settings options.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Standalone button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout, showing loading state during authentication and toggling between login and logout actions.
frontend/src/components/MarkdownRenderer: Dependency-free markdown-to-HTML renderer that parses common markdown syntax (headers, bold, italic, links, code blocks, lists) and renders it via dangerouslySetInnerHTML.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts newly authenticated users to enter a display name to initialize their RepoRadar profile, submitting via the useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation.
frontend/src/components/RepositoryCard.t: Card component displaying a GitHub repository's name, description, topics, language, and stats (stars, forks, watchers), with bookmark and AI analysis panel integration and navigation to the repo detail page.
frontend/src/components/SearchFilters.ts: Search filter bar component providing a text query input plus dropdowns/inputs for language, topic, and minimum star count filters, with a clear-filters action.
frontend/src/components/SimilarProjectsS: Section component that fetches and displays up to five similar GitHub repositories based on the current repo's language and topics, with skeleton loading states and navigation on click.
frontend/src/components/TagFilter.tsx: Renders a row of colored tag filter buttons with toggle and clear-all functionality, assigning consistent colors to tags via a hash function.
Displays a list of tech stack badges as colored pill spans, using each badge's color for border, background, and text styling.
frontend/src/components/TimeRangeSelecto: Renders a segmented button group for selecting a time range of 'day', 'week', or 'month', highlighting the active selection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Provides bookmark state and toggle logic by composing the bookmark query/mutation hooks and the Internet Identity authentication status.
frontend/src/hooks/useCommitSetupFiles.t: Manages committing multiple files to a GitHub repository, tracking per-file upload status and surfacing success/error toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useForkRepo.ts: Handles forking a GitHub repository via the API, storing the fork result and showing toast notifications on success or failure.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login, logout, and identity state to the component tree.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend interactions including user profiles, bookmarks (CRUD + tags/notes), and GitHub token management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global CSS including Tailwind imports, OKLCH-based design tokens for light/dark themes, custom utility classes, and markdown content typography styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BookmarksPage.tsx: Displays the authenticated user's bookmarked GitHub repositories with tag filtering, loading skeletons, and the ability to remove bookmarks. Shows a login prompt for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with a hero section and a four-feature grid (Smart Search, Trending, AI Analysis, Bookmarks) linking to the Trending and Search pages.
frontend/src/pages/RepoDetailsPage.tsx: Detail view for a single GitHub repository showing stats, README, contributors, tech stack badges, AI analysis, and fork/bookmark actions via tabbed layout.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Search page that lets users filter GitHub repositories by keyword, language, topic, and star count, displaying results as cards with loading skeletons and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/TrendingPage.tsx: Shows trending GitHub repositories ranked by stars for a selectable time range (day/week/month) with skeleton loading states, error handling, and a manual refresh button.
frontend/src/services/githubApi.ts: Provides functions to interact with the GitHub REST API, including searching repositories, fetching trending repos, retrieving READMEs, contributors, file trees, and forking. Handles authentication via optional tokens and standardizes error responses.
frontend/src/types/github.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for GitHub API data structures including Repository, SearchResponse, Contributor, RepoFileTree, RepoContent, CommitFile, and ForkResult.
frontend/src/utils/dockerComposeGenerato: Generates a docker-compose.yml file string based on repo analysis, including the main app service and optional Postgres, Redis, or MongoDB services inferred from environment variable names.
frontend/src/utils/repoInsights.ts: Generates a structured insight object for a repository including a summary, reasons why it's interesting, and a difficulty rating (Beginner/Intermediate/Advanced) based on topics, stars, forks, and size.
frontend/src/utils/setupInstructionsGene: Generates a Markdown setup guide for a repository based on its analysis, covering prerequisites, environment configuration, dependency installation, and run commands for Node.js, Python, Rust, and Go projects.
Defines the RepoAnalysis interface, an analyzeRepo function that detects tech stack and configuration from file paths and file contents, and a generateSetupScript function that produces a bash setup script for the repository.
frontend/src/utils/techStackDetector.ts: Detects a repository's tech stack by analyzing the primary language, file paths, and topics, returning an array of named and color-coded TechStackBadge objects (up to 8).
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom dark-tech color tokens (oklch-based), neon green accents, custom fonts (JetBrains Mono, Inter), box shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file describing a GitHub Explorer web app with pending feature requests including personalized recommendations, roadmap extraction, README generation, Termux integration, Docker support, and GitHub PAT settings.
